a.span: Form for students to request their transcript

p.span:
TEECS students design an experiment to be launched
to the International Space Station.

The program allows high school students to earn an associate degree as they
complete the requirements for their high school degree
TEECS Middle and High school team ended the season with Runner Up / Second Place.
TEECS made it to State Tournament by taking the 1st Place in Science Olympiad Regional Tournament held at NJIT Campus on January 8, 2019.
TEECS High school basketball team got much success during the 2018-2019 season.
